mkr.ant.taskdefs.condition
Class ConditionBase<P>

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.ConditionBase,P>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.condition.ConditionBase<P>

public class ConditionBase<P>
extends AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.ConditionBase,P>

Baseclass for the <condition> task as well as several conditions - ensures that the types of conditions inside the task and the "container" conditions are in sync.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.ConditionBase)
